TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PublishingCatalogUtility extends System.Object
public ref class PublishingCatalogUtility abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Utilities that publish a list or a library as a publishing catalog for subscription from another site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool GetCatalogConfiguration (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, out Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.CatalogShareSettings catalogSettings, out string selectedTaxonomyField);

.method public static hidebysig bool GetCatalogConfiguration(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, [out] class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.CatalogShareSettings& catalogSettings, [out] string& selectedTaxonomyField) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCatalogConfiguration (list As SPList, ByRef catalogSettings As CatalogShareSettings, ByRef selectedTaxonomyField As String) As Boolean

public: static bool GetCatalogConfiguration(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ list, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::CatalogShareSettings ^ % catalogSettings, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % selectedTaxonomyField);
static member GetCatalogConfiguration : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList * * -> bool

Docs.param: The object for which configuration information is returned.
Configuration information for the shared publishing catalog.

Managed property name from the search schema of the default taxonomy field in the shared catalog. The categories in this field can be used by a catalog subscriber to determine the navigation hierarchy that represents this catalog at a subscribing site.
Docs.summary: Gets catalog configuration information for a shared publishing catalog.
Docs.returns: true if this list is a shared catalog; otherwise, false

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool GetIsFieldValueFriendlyForUrl (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField catalogItemCandidateKeyField);

static member GetIsFieldValueFriendlyForUrl : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField -> bool

Docs.param: The site column being tested.
Docs.summary: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the is valid to use to create friendly URLs for items in this catalog.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that indicates whether the SPField object is valid to use to create friendly URLs for items in this catalog.

remarks.para: Use this method to determine if a field being used to uniquely identify an item is also a valid component for friendly URLs that represent the item in a subscribing site. For example, fields of type DateTime will not provide clean, friendly URLs at a subscribing site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PublishCatalog (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, bool allowAnonymousAccess);
.method public static hidebysig void PublishCatalog(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, bool allowAnonymousAccess) cil managed
Public Shared Sub PublishCatalog (parentWeb As SPWeb, list As SPList, allowAnonymousAccess As Boolean)
public: static void PublishCatalog(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPWeb ^ parentWeb, Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ list, bool allowAnonymousAccess);
static member PublishCatalog : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb * Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList * bool -> unit

Docs.param: Parent web containing the list or library being shared.
List or library being shared.

Whether the content of this catalog is anonymously accessible from the search service. Setting this property to true does not affect access to the list by using a content database that uses CAML queries.
Docs.summary: Shares (publishes) a list or library as a publishing catalog for subscription at another site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PublishCatalog (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, Nullable<bool> allowAnonymousAccess, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> furlFields, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.CatalogTaxonomyFieldSettings> taxFields);

.method public static hidebysig void PublishCatalog(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> allowAnonymousAccess, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> furlFields, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.CatalogTaxonomyFieldSettings> taxFields) cil managed

Public Shared Sub PublishCatalog (parentWeb As SPWeb, list As SPList, allowAnonymousAccess As Nullable(Of Boolean), furlFields As IEnumerable(Of String), taxFields As IEnumerable(Of CatalogTaxonomyFieldSettings))

public: static void PublishCatalog(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPWeb ^ parentWeb, Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ list, Nullable<bool> allowAnonymousAccess, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ furlFields, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::CatalogTaxonomyFieldSettings ^> ^ taxFields);
static member PublishCatalog : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb * Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList * Nullable<bool> * seq<string> * seq<Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.CatalogTaxonomyFieldSettings> -> unit

Docs.param: The parent web that contains the list or library that is being shared.
The list or library that is being shared.

Specifies whether the content of this catalog is anonymously accessible from the search service. Setting this property to true does not affect access to the list via the content database using CAML queries.

Auto-generated managed property names of a object that can uniquely identify an item in the catalog. These properties can be used by a catalog subscriber to create friendly URLs for items in this catalog.

Managed property name from the search schema of the default taxonomy field in the shared catalog. The categories in this field can be used by a catalog subscriber to determine the navigation hierarchy representing this catalog at a subscribing site.
Docs.summary: Shares (publishes) a list or library as a publishing catalog for subscription at another site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PublishCatalog (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, bool allowAnonymousAccess, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField> catalogItemKeyFields, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField> allListCategoryFields, Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField selectedCategoryField);

.method public static hidebysig void PublishCatalog(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb parentWeb, class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list, bool allowAnonymousAccess, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField> catalogItemKeyFields, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField> allListCategoryFields, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField selectedCategoryField) cil managed

Public Shared Sub PublishCatalog (parentWeb As SPWeb, list As SPList, allowAnonymousAccess As Boolean, catalogItemKeyFields As IEnumerable(Of SPField), allListCategoryFields As IEnumerable(Of TaxonomyField), selectedCategoryField As TaxonomyField)

public: static void PublishCatalog(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPWeb ^ parentWeb, Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ list, bool allowAnonymousAccess, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Microsoft::SharePoint::SPField ^> ^ catalogItemKeyFields, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::TaxonomyField ^> ^ allListCategoryFields, Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::TaxonomyField ^ selectedCategoryField);

static member PublishCatalog : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb * Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList * bool * seq<Microsoft.SharePoint.SPField> * seq<Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField> * Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TaxonomyField -> unit

Docs.param: Parent web containing the list or library being shared.
List or library being shared.

Whether the content of the catalog is anonymously accessible from the search service. Setting the property to true does not affect access to the list by using a content database that uses CAML queries.

List columns in this catalog that would identify an item uniquely. For example, item ID, item number, etc. These are fields that catalog subscribers can use to create unique, friendly URLs for items in this catalog.
Taxonomy fields that are available in this catalog. This list can be used by the catalog subscriber to determine the navigation hierarchy representing the catalog at a subscribing site.

The default taxonomy field that determines the navigation hierarchy that represents this catalog at a subscribing site. The categories in this field can be added to the navigation hierarchy of a subscribing site to create friendly URLs for items in this catalog.
Docs.summary: Shares (publishes) a list or library as a publishing catalog for subscription at another site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void UnPublishCatalog (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list);
.method public static hidebysig void UnPublishCatalog(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList list) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UnPublishCatalog (list As SPList)
public: static void UnPublishCatalog(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ list);
static member UnPublishCatalog : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList -> unit

Docs.param: The list or library to unpublish.
Docs.summary: Specifies a list or library to stop sharing as a publishing catalog..

remarks.para: If a list or library is unpublished, it will no longer be available for subscription and it will no longer be accessible anonymously from search. Unpublishing a catalog impacts portals that render catalog content to anonymous users.
